issue.title: drive.google.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.5

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://drive.google.com/drive/mobile/folders/1xVZV4Ox571ODDos7R5xh6Dpuoy70DUkA

### Issue URL (Ads) [NSFW] [https://www.toongod.org/webtoon/son-of-nam/chapter-4/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.toongod.org%2Fwebtoon%2Fson-of-nam%2Fchapter-4%2F) ### Comment > Go to the webpage and wait for 2 minutes on Mac, then click on anywhere on the page, for example the next button. A pop up is experienced. On iOS 14.8, I don't need to wait for 2 minutes as popup is experienced immediately. issue.title: paint.net

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

Firefox

Desktop

https://comicvine.gamespot.com/

_No response_
